title: Having doubts about Islam
transcript: if they are unintentional then Allah will not punish you for that Allah will punish you for doubts that you analyze in your head and you get carried away with them but things that attack you and jump over you thoughts and doubts that come Uninvited no Allah will not inshallah hold you accountable as long as you do not want them and as long as you're trying your best to reject them
